properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 p1 v2 p1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy, Holy, Holy, Holy
Holy, Holy Lord God Almighty

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As We Lift Our Hearts Before You
As a Token of Our Love

verse.name: p1a
verse.lines: Precious Jesus, Precious Jesus, Precious Jesus

verse.name: p1b
verse.lines: How We Love And Adore You
